com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet.render
Interface Camera

All Known Implementing Classes:
CameraJOGL
public interface Camera

This is the interface to be implemented by objects that are Cameras

martin

lookAtScene

void lookAtScene()
Carry out the rendering operations to set up the camera ready to draw a frame. Modifies the OpenGL projection etc.

rotateAxis

void rotateAxis(float degrees,
                float x,
                float y,
                float z)
Rotate the camera about an arbitary axis (for positioning)

Parameters:
degrees - The amount of desired rotation
x - the X component of this rotation
y - the Y component of this rotation
z - the Z component of this rotation

rotateEye

void rotateEye(float dx,
               float dy)
Rotates about the eye - changes the scene center

Parameters:
dx - The desired X rotation
dy - The desired Y rotation

rotatePoint

void rotatePoint(float x,
                 float y,
                 float z,
                 float dx,
                 float dy)
Rotate the camera about an arbitary axis (for positioning)

Parameters:
x - The X coordinate of the rotation point
y - The Y coordinate of the rotation point
z - The Z coordinate of the rotation point
dx - The desired X rotation
dy - The desired Y rotation
